website_summaries.verdict: The absolute best water filtration system you can buy. The golden difference: the Tap Master's ability to re-introduce lost healthy minerals.
pros: Reverse Osmosis system that thoroughly purifies water
Re-introduces precious lost minerals after initial filtration
cons: The most expensive system on our shortlist, but it is well worth the extra investment

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, water tastes amazing, fast pouring
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product for a month now. 1) It was fairly easy to install. It came with all the correct equipment and fittings. 2) I live in Arizona in a place that has very hard water. Tap water measures 480 ppm, and the RO water measures 22 ppm (my RO system adds mineral back). See attached pictures. 3) There are no leaks or drips whatsoever - everything seems well built. 4) This has fairly high pressure coming out. Not as fast as the tap, but much faster than most RO systems I have used at friend's houses. 5) Water tastes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: SkubalaHead

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting water!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first RO system and I love it! Before this I had bottle service delivered to my house and I had no intention of switching, unfortunately my back went out so could not longer mount the 5 gallon jugs. I read many reviews, I did some research and figured this was the best system for the price. I wanted to preserve some flavor in the water which is how I narrowed it down to this system. I can't tell the difference in the water flavor from my bottle service water. My neighbors RO water is bland so I am very pleased with my system. I do recommend this system!
customer_reviews.author: Someone pulled the illustrations

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for one year and just performed the filter change. Every aspect of performance and design is exemplary. Water quality is perfect, filter change is as easy as can be. This is so much better than my former GE system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: Delightful results
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a failed older system with one that adds minerals back in (after RO processing) - The water tastes delightful. Thankful for superb technical help with minor self inflicted problem. Left message with Home Master on weekend, got help first thing Monday morning. Superb knowledgeable help! Had replacement part very next day - no charge. Will stay with this companies products the rest of my life. Unit is modular, simple fast straight forward installation. Complete quality parts of everything I needed. I'd recommend to loved-ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very pleased with our reverse osmosis water filtration system. Before we moved to the NC coast, my husband called Perfect Water Technologies where he received an excellent customer service experience. We had concerns about the drinking water at the coast, so we had the system installed when we built our new home. We no longer lug small or gallon bottles of water from the store into the house, thus saving money, our backs and lessen our carbon footprint by being environmentally friendly. We also have reusable water bottles that we fill with the filtered water. We highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Great RO system!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this system. Installation was quick and very DIY friendly. I have no plumbing experience what so ever, and had no issues at all installing this system. Not didn't encounter a single difficulty. After installing the system I contacted the company for parts to get a refrigerator line from my previous RO tied into the new one. Will was beyond helpful and super nice. If you are on the fence about with RO system to go with I 100% recommend this one. They are a friendly, American made company and the water tastes fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: DWK

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say the Home Master RO system is by far very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system to replace my old Watts Premier RO 5 Stages. I've setup 2 Watt Premier RO systems in the past, and I have to say the Home Master RO system is by far very easy to setup. I have not replaced the filter for the Home Master RO system, yet. I guess I will come back to update my review one year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Truong

customer_reviews.title: Good easy system
customer_reviews.text: If you have the right shut off valve under the sink this thing is a breeze to put together, 20 or 30 min job not counting start up fill and drain procedures. The shark-bite connections are super quick to assemble and take apart and only a few attachments need a little tape (included) to put together. Though if you have an old sink, with old pipes and old connections and an old version of the system from the 90's in the way, it is a plumbing job and all the joy that comes with one of those. I had that one.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Now I have an unlimited supply of the most delicious mineral water!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reverse osmosis unit specifically because it adds minerals back into the water, and it was completely worth it. The water tastes delicious. It's a huge difference from my parents' reverse osmosis unit, which produces water that is clean but has no taste. This water has a nice minerally taste to it that makes it wonderful to drink. When I first got the unit, I found myself drinking far more water just because I enjoyed it so much. It reminds me of expensive water from the health food store that would cost $2 per bottle, and I have an unlimited free supply now :) I cannot recommend this product highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Man

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer support
customer_reviews.text: This system was very easy to install and the water tastes great! I have had this system for over a year now and just replaced the 3 filters. The filter replacement was very easy and the instructions they came with were easy to follow. I did run into one small issue at the one year mark. I only mention this to be able to say how awesome and responsive customer service is! The customer service team was so eager to resolve my issue that they actually followed up with me a few times when I did not respond to their first email back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great tasting water. Easy install for DIYers.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we ordered this RO system! It was easy to install ourselves. We contacted to company about connecting it to our refrigerator and they told us how to order an inexpensive kit from their website. Very helpful people. On their website they have great videos to help any DIYer with the install of the system. Makes it super easy. We had everything done in a few hours. Now we have fantastic tasting water and ice!!!! I highly recommend the system both for value and the company. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Push buy now!
customer_reviews.text: This RO system is amazing! Very simple to install and the 3/8" supply and tap feed lines make for some serious output on faucet pressure. The taste is perfect. I am glad that I returned the 500 dollar system that I previously purchased. It doesn't look pretty under the sink but the no filter canister design makes me feel more comfortable about potential leaks like my previous canister style RO system. Just buy it and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item three years ago and I had a question regarding replacing the RO filter. I messaged them on the website and got a very rapid and knowledgable response. He suggested to call them since I had several questions. The company had a live person who answered the phone and was pleasant and extremely helpful. This type of service is hard to find nowadays and I was quite impressed! He even sent a follow up e-mail with all the information included and his direct extension should I have further questions. The unit works great as well! I'd highly recommend this brand for the above reasons, plus a five year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Drivesalot

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: i have had purchased other filters in the past, and this time i was fooled by the reviews on it making me think that its the best filter, but no better than others, i would rather say its much less in quality, it leaks water from some connections, the drain pipe doesn't fit well, the storage tank gets empty too soon, the instruction manual is a disaster, with no clear path, you will never figure how to install unless you had prior experience, the faucet is bad in design, bad in quality, and bad look and color. AND IS STILL MOST EXPENSIVE FOR NO GOOD REASON AT ALL. not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ch. expert

customer_reviews.title: Home Master seems to be good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a Culligan RO system and it works as well as the system it’s replacing. Not really sure if it’s any better but clean drinkable water from my well is a huge plus. I combined this with the Home Master well filters and softener and overall the water has improved immensely. So their stuff really works,now it’s a matter of figuring out how long it works with my horrible water. For now I’m really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Instillation was super easy, instructions were way to detailed but perhaps a non-DYIer would need the extra information. Took up less space that I thought which was nice and the pressure is very good. Water taste just like the RO water that we were buying from Whole Foods, just a bunch cheaper. For us pay-back is about a year and this made having clean water easer to always have available.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit as a replacement for an older system from another national company because it had developed a leak and I was tired of paying someone else their prices to change filters and an occasional RO membrane. As I had the holes already and connections the unit went in very fast. I had to get an additional fitting from the local hardware store for my existing ice maker line due to the fast flow feature using a larger tubing. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Whatawatermelon

customer_reviews.title: Water is pure and safe for anyone to drink
customer_reviews.text: After installing, our drinking water tastes better, is crystal clear and ice cubes slip out of the ice maker. I have studied water pollution and this system addresses all of the dangers of bad city or well water making it safe for your family to have an endless supply of contamination free drinking water while eliminating high costs of buying bottled water which many times is unsafe also. Highly recommend this system. Easy to install and running trouble free for two years now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel ballock

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Filter Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this system for many years (15+) When they offered the artesian option, I switched to it. With the minerals added, the water tastes great. It's easy to install. And if you're worried about the installation, they have customer service reps in the USA that are incredibly friendly and helpful. I did have a problem with a replacement filter set, and couldn't figure out why. I called the company and they diagnosed the issue. The NEXT DAY the part that solved the problem had arrived on my doorstep. That's just hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: SciFi Gal

customer_reviews.title: easy, clean, pretty unit
customer_reviews.text: It was easy for my handiman to install. It is attractive to look at under the sink. I had a little blip when first filling and using it so I called the manufacturer. They were INCREDIBLY patient and helpful while I turned my valves as directed. Plus, the answered the phone promptly. Excellent product, excellent customer service. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Soren Kerk

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite things we did to upgrade our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, this is absolutely my favorite choice! I love that it adds minerals back into the water, and we tell everyone about it. We did so many water tests at our home before the system and after installing the system. You can taste the difference even from our filtered water from our fridge. It's incredible and one of my favorite things we did to upgrade our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful system
customer_reviews.text: I am a water snob, and this system produces great tasting water. I have started to notice that I am not a fan anymore of most bottled waters - they just don't match up. I find that even though there are minerals added to the water, it's such a small amount that the water is still fine for my steaming appliances. It kind of brought my iron back to life. I didn't actually try a cleaning, but after using this water a few times, suddenly the steaming and spray functions started working again as all the hard water deposits were washed away. Totally unexpected benefit. I love this system and am so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Trillian

customer_reviews.title: Not only does our well water taste great after filtering but the customer service is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Not only does our well water taste great after filtering but the customer service is fantastic. A year into using the product we accidentally perforated a tubing line while replacing our kitchen faucet. Customer service quickly responded to our inquiry and sent out the replacement parts and instructions to fix the broken item. When I mentioned I loved everything about the unit with the exception of the water waste that all reverse osmosis units produce they helped us with a solution that reduces this waste by 80% saving both water and money on our water bill! Anyone interested in their water quality for both drinking and whole house is in good hands with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina C.

customer_reviews.title: This product is Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Installed at the kitchen sink. Installation was easy and my only regrets are not installing one before. The water is superb! I have been using the system for a while now and it continues to be great. The water flavor is outstanding and it always has a good flow available and never slows down. I highly recommend Home Master TMAFC Artesian Full Contact Undersink Reverse Osmosis Water Filter System!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H North

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this RO system. I had to use a different plastic adaptor nut that is included(connects tank line to faucet). The one that came with the system leaked when I hand tightened it. The company sent me out a replacement but I opted to use a better one from a wholesale plumbing supply store. Tiny problem but one that should be addressed. Super easy DIY install project for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tom liston

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its Glowing Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system given its good reviews, because it restores minerals to the water, and because filter replacement is uncomplicated. Most systems have filters that need to be replaced at different times (one in 6 months, one in a year, one in five years). But this system is all filters replaced once a year. That makes it easy. Now that I have it I can say it lives up to its glowing reviews. The water pours out well, no trickle here, it tastes great and the tank restores itself quickly. Everyone in my household is drinking more water. Even the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 years of Use and filter degradation
customer_reviews.text: The RO system worked well, but recently, the main RO filter wasn't working, as it neared its life. The water would quickly die out from faucet. Ordered the new RO filter (SKU MH-50) which is around +/- $105.95 + $20 shipping or so. Changed the main filter, but it didnt work as well. This replacement RO filter is only sold at perfectwater.com. The water would still die out quick. We believe this is affecting our health. As there is no way to check the water quality, I believe these systems need to be completely replaced every 3-4 years instead of spending on expensive filters. Do the yearly maintenance though.
customer_reviews.author: DrillBudd

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have it for four months and I love it. It was easy to install. Water taste good and I checked the clearance it gave me green but not very low. I live in LA that might be case. One of the connectors were damaged I called them and amazing customer service I sent them the picture of the item because couldn’t explain them which part. They mailed it to me, it took few days.
customer_reviews.author: Manan

customer_reviews.title: Top quality RO system with best water taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Home Master RO system for one and a half year now. The water quality and test is simply great in particular thanks to the artesian filter. With the help of the tank, I get ideal pressure levels for every day use. It is very easy to maintain the system by replacing filters. Differently from the canister type, you get a brand new item every time. I recently bought the sanitized tubing for increased hygiene
customer_reviews.author: LePlatChaud

customer_reviews.title: We love this system
customer_reviews.text: We love this system. We use it for drinking, cooking, and even air purifying. The water tastes great. I was able to install it myself without any hiccups and when I had a new filter that for some reason was not giving me the right pressure I called their customer service and got a completely satisfactory walk through fixing the issue. (Of course it was something I missed in the process :)). Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Inna Rukov

customer_reviews.title: How can you beat great water with zero hassle?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this system for four years now without one single issue of any type! Previously, we were using a Kinetico system that cost at least 3X as much as this Home Master system. I have been immensely pleased with the constant water delivery pressure, high water quality, good taste, and trouble-free operation provided by the Home Master. I installed this myself and needed only a couple of connectors from local home improvement store to get the old Kinetico out and this superior system in. A slam-dunk 5-star rating on this one!
customer_reviews.author: DKC73

customer_reviews.title: ... systems before and this one and this is the best system I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 systems before and this one and this is the best system I have used. Water quality is good and the flow rate from the sprocket is fast flowing. It has been installed for exactly 6 months now and I have no problems with its duel hook up with my refrigerator and sprocket. I did purchase a more upgraded sprocket water dispenser for my kitchen counter top to replace the standard sprocket that came with the unit. I haven't changed the filters yet for they recommend 1 yr change.
customer_reviews.author: ebo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful system. CAUTION!! READ MY COMMENTS
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful system. Great Customer Service at Home Master. CAUTION!!!!! Do Not Buy the Watts Permeate Pump bundled through Amazon, it will void the Home Master warrantee! Buy the Permeate Pump from Home Master Direct because there is an additional part needed for the installation to their system. In fact the instructions that come with the pump bought through Amazon does not apply to the Home Master system, it's doesn't work right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution.
customer_reviews.text: Buying purified water from stores is always a hassle, especially now with the COVID 19 situation. I wanted to limit my trips to the store. I decided to buy and install a filter at home. After researching and checking reviews, I decided to get the Home Master TMAFC Artisan Full contact Reverse Osmosis water filter system. It is easy to install, all the parts I needed came in the package. To be sure it is working properly, I tested the water with a water purity test kit. The results were on target. Now I have the peace of mind that I have clean water at home. No more buying from stores.
customer_reviews.author: vahe joulhaian

customer_reviews.title: We love it and use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: This system is the heart of our home! We love it and use it for everything. We have the full Contact system and if I could give it more stars I would. We've had it (see purchase date of 2013) for four years so I can really vouch for it. THeir customer service is outstanding- second to none. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up for Product and Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Despite the tangled mess that the picture portrays, this system is actually quite easy to install (hint: watch the videos on the website - much easier to follow than the manual). Water tastes great and replaced an old Sears/Kenmore system that served us well for about 10 years. One other big plus here is customer support. When my system arrived, the RO tank was dented. I called the phone number in the manual and could not have had a better experience. Excellent all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wohlers

customer_reviews.title: Quality check
customer_reviews.text: The product was damaged. It leaks after installation . It costs to install and uninstall . Please have a quality check before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I've never liked the "sharp" taste of pure RO water
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not the cheapest on the market, but has a lot going for it. Not the least of which is the re-addition of calcium ions when you dispense the water. I've never liked the "sharp" taste of pure RO water. They've got the right idea by blending the calcium back into the effluent. You'll like the taste better, I assure you. Next time you go to the grocery store, notice the different methods bottlers use when bottling their water. Some are pure RO water, others are purified mineral water (or water with minerals added). Either way, pure RO will not be near as palatable as blended water IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I have every purchased
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have every purchased. Worth every penny. I am not a 'tap water' person. I used to by spring water in 5 gallon bottles from the store and it was a painful experience having to lug 5-6 bottles from the store every couple of weeks. No more! I can't believe I did not purchase this filter sooner. The pH of water as tested by my Hanna pH meter is 8.5, which indicates that 're-mineralization' works very well. I get a great tasting, non-acidic (as pure RO water is) water. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SPS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research into these before choosing the Home Master. After more than two years, I'm happy to say we absolutely love this unit! We had been seeking a filtering solution for many years and this is going to stay with us forever! It's far cheaper to operate than the other filters we used before and the water quality way better! I installed the filter myself and the filter changes have been super easy. Thanks Home Master for making a terrific product! Great customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tootertutor1

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water~
customer_reviews.text: There are just 2 of us at home and using this filtering system now. It is much less complicated the Culligan system we had before and it cost a lot less to purchase/rent. After 1 year I am finally getting around to ordering new filters, but I've checked my total dissolved solids and the water still seems perfect. I will change it out in the next couple of months just to ensure the life of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Texas mama

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: We've had this system for a few years and it works great. Install was easier than expected and replacement filters come with new hoses. We liked it some much we wanted to add a line to our fridge. Perfect Water Tech walked me through the required systems and the fridge kit was surprisingly affordable. I recommend the Fast Flow option - its been great.
customer_reviews.author: londonlawmom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: We have had this filter for almost three years. It has been reliable; we have had no issues, exactly as we have expected. We are very picky about the taste of our coffee and we use it multiple times for day for large pots of coffee as well as for cooking and miscellaneous uses. The water tastes fine. The filter is so much better and easier to use than our original filter. In short, we hardly think about it as everything is as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My family lives in the Midland Odessa area of TX. The locals told us not to drink the water unless you have an RO. This system works great and was easy to install. The water quality is night and day difference from before we installed it. I will install the system into any house I move to in any part of the county. I have recommended this system to a number of people and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wow is all I can say
customer_reviews.text: We previously had the Reverse Osmosis System from Costco, and when we remodeled our kitchen, our contractor recommended this brand. It doesn't disappoint and the water is so pure and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Momma

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 years and this one is by far the best one. I had just recently installed the Aquifor ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd RO system I've bought in 2 years and this one is by far the best one. I had just recently installed the Aquifor compact system... it had horrible water flow and made all kinds of noise and whistling. Bought this one to replace the other one and it does everything well. High water pressure, great tasting water, no noise and it seems like the filters are going to be pretty easy to change. This one is a definite buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to install, little pressre, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is not an easy install as it says. I had to hire a plumber. Also, it didn't come with the pump, had to purchase this separate & the pump left the water with a chemical taste even after several gallons. So I took out the pump. I have little water pressure but good tasting water. Purchased a 2.5 gallon water container fill up & put in the fridge so it ended up ok in the end. Very happy with the quality of the pure water.
customer_reviews.author: T Esp

customer_reviews.title: Can't find a fault.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, watched a couple youtube videos the night before. Read the instructions, all it took was a drill, 1/2" drill bit for the sink faucet, 1/4" drill bit for the drain pipe, philips drill bit for the screws. Water tastes good after flushing, I had soft water before that was giving me headaches and spiking my blood pressure. I feel much better now, no headaches more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Triston K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to install and maintain
customer_reviews.text: I've had many RO systems before. Changing the filters has always been a chore. One I bought from Costco would clog up over time and cause a leak in the system. This one is super easy to install and use. Changing the filters are a breeze. I like that there is no housing to host molds and mildew. Our family family enjoys using this and the water tastes like water should
customer_reviews.author: John Fong

customer_reviews.title: Great system! The Home Master was a great upgrade ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system! The Home Master was a great upgrade from my previous, very expensive RO machine. This was very reasonably priced and performed as advertised. I particularly like the speed of the regeneration speed and the consistent water pressure. The taste and assurance of the mineral replacement feature is a plus. I highly recommend this system and customer service is well done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Magers

customer_reviews.title: Other reviewers have done a fantastic job of providing detailed
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for 18 months. Other reviewers have done a fantastic job of providing detailed, in-depth reviews about what/how it filters, how hard it is to install, etc. -- so I won't rehash that info here. What I WILL tell you is that this thing provides the best tasting water I've ever had the pleasure of drinking. The only downside is that you will be so "spoiled" by your fantastic-tasting water at home that you'll be continually disappointed by any other water you drink -- bottled or from a tap. If you're on the fence about whether or not to order it, don't hesitate. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tinywishes

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SYSTEM MY WATER TASTES SO MUCH BETTER! I used to buy bottles of water all the time but this changed everything! So easy to install which is so hard to find with water systems like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install- excellent filtration!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to install- instructions are thorough and easy to understand and follow. Replacement filters are affordable, easy to purchase and install. Water improvement is impressive. I used to have an undercounter filter system that left the water bland and tasteless, and I had to order the replacement filters from a local supplier so the price changed every time. Home Master TMAFC adds minerals back in to the water so the water tastes like, well, water! Good water! I have two systems installed- one upstairs and one downstairs. Thank you Home Master.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Osann

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with our Home Master Artesian RO system! This system is affordable, has easy to change filters and re-mineralizes the water after filtration. We also bought the permeate pump ( which is inexpensive ) that reduces the water consumption of the system by 80 percent, and effectively lets us have reverse osmosis water without wasting water. This system is also not too bulky under our kitchen sink. I was able to change our garbage disposal recently without any space limitations from the system. A great value, and the water and ice cubes are odorless, crystal clear and taste great! System is quiet as well. Glad I bought this system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great System!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered his product based on multiple reviews from independent consumer review sites and we love it! This has replaced our deer park dispenser which cost $70 per month and while deer park is somewhat filtered, it still contains fluoride along with some other things. This water filter is compact for an undercounter system and was very easy for our plumber to install. It tastes great and is perfectly clear. I purchased the permeate pump based on a few recommendations but returned it because our water pressure was great. You may need it if you run on well water but if you use city water you won't need it. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The water taste very good.
customer_reviews.text: We install this water tank in our new kitchen under the sink, Take our one day to Put it on, the screw cap it’s very hard to turning tight, but the water come out very good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's the Bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This water filter system works great, great tasting water. Installation took a little bit of time, but you are working under a sink. That will always slow you down. Overall it was really quite easy to install. The instructions were clear, and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Finally perfect water
customer_reviews.text: Tap Master TMAFC Artesian Full Contact Reverse Osmosis is best for west Coast, since water's TDS is high (above 460 in some parts). This RO is now giving me below 67 after adding essential minerals by the 7 stage system. No more trips to store for bottled waters. The installation was simple and anyone can do it. My shipment had broken elbow nipple on carbon filter, contact the seller and they sent me the nipple immediately. The support also explained how RO works step by step. If you need good life out of this system, use RO more often and replace sediment filter every 6 to 12 months. The membrane life will be extended (costly piece)
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY - SUPER EFFICIENT - DELICIOUS WATER!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing about this system to dislike. We had a plumber install it since that's just not our expertise. Went together just fine; so so happy with the water it produces. Highly recommend this to anyone who needs a water filtering system - awesome quality and super performance!
customer_reviews.author: dakotareader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filtration system
customer_reviews.text: The filtration system works as stated. We recently traded in our Zero Water system as the cost for replacement filters for a family of 4 was insane. After extensive research we decided to purchase this system and have been doing water quality checks since the time of installation. The levels have remained consistent even after 2 months of use. This is well worth the price and I would highly recommend it! Installation for an average Joe is minimal as all fittings are included in kit.
customer_reviews.author: Aceinthehole2

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Drinking Water!
customer_reviews.text: We are thoroughly pleased with the clean, refreshing taste of our water since installing our Home Master Reverse Osmosis Water Filter System. The city water we had previously been drinking contained a high amount of chlorine and other contaminants that left an aftertaste with each drink. It's so nice to fill a glass of water from the RO spout and drink great water! We even freeze some for ice. The system was installed quickly & easily. We've had our system for only a month now, but have already noticed improvements to our overall health.
customer_reviews.author: sharon merrill

customer_reviews.title: top of the class
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed in our previous system from a different manufacturer due to very slow flow of the treated water. This model took vare of that problem in spades. We could not be happier with our system, the flow rate is great and customer service was way beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: No diagrams!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so frustrating, the instructions are crap! My Plummer does not do well with English instructions and they do NOT provide simple diagrams, IGNORANT!
customer_reviews.author: Michele G

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY Installation and operating perfectly a year later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this RO filter through Amazon after getting a couple of "through the roof" estimates from local companies to install a system in my kitchen. Although it feels a little like you're assembling the International Space Station, installation was painless with very detailed instructions and all the parts necessary for a cabinet install. I was very impressed with the quality and fit of the parts - - no on-site modifications needed. The taste of the water is amazing - - it's all my grandkids will drink now! I would highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBob

customer_reviews.title: Great water system.
customer_reviews.text: Our family has had this system working for about 3 years now, and the only problem has been a 'stuck' shut-off valve. Customer support diagnosed the problem over the phone and promptly sent a free replacement valve. Great tasting water at a great price, and happy in the knowledge my family is drinking quality water.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hornby

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: We researched a lot of RO systems, and finally settled on the Tap Master Full Contact RO Under Counter unit. I called the company to ask a question before installation, and the customer service was amazing/excellent/personable. Best ever. The installation went smoothly and the unit has worked exactly as advertised. We've had great tasting and great smelling water for almost a year, and we couldn't be happier. No more hauling bottles to the water store! We'd recommend this unit to anyone looking for a solution to their drinking and cooking water needs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Van Nostrand

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: We have had our filter installed for about a week now and I love it. The water tastes amazing and clean. We had the brita filters before and I hated that they couldn't remove all the chemicals in the water, including fluoride. I am so excited that we are no longer drinking the waste that this country puts into our water! My husband, while installing, watched the video's on youtube b/c apparently the direction aren't the greatest and a pipe hookup was wrong. But following the video's, everything went in great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Great reverse osmosis system that is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent reverse osmosis system. It was as easy to install as promised. I have never really managed my own plumbing though I consider myself pretty handy around the house. The water tastes excellent. I've had it for a year now and couldn't be happier. (Sadly) I didn't receive a dime for my review. So maybe that makes this review more reliable? I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: Working fine
customer_reviews.text: We had an older reverse osmosis machine for 5 years and it started leaking so I replaced i with this one we get twice the water flow
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to install under the kitchen sink, but we do love having clean drinking water without the chlorine, and chromium 6 that our city water is known to contain. I love the taste and that we don't have to buy good drinking water in plastic bottles any more! We use it for cooking too. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: jocey peach

customer_reviews.title: Good water
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my condo in Long Beach California and the city water tastes great now. No more carrying gallons from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: This reserve osmosis water system is one of the best. Having a large family I depend on this, I use it from drinking to wash fresh fruits and veggies to watering my plants. It’s a wonderful, reliable and easy to install. We purchased this system in 2016 and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: I water tastes like water!
customer_reviews.text: I’m semi handy and had no trouble installing the system included the fridge extension. We are all loving it so much at home we’ve stopped drinking anything different from water. I water tastes like water!!!! Pure water!!! Great buy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: jaob

customer_reviews.title: Great water, love the minerals added back, love the flow.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second system like this. We put this in our house in Texas, and when we sold the house we learned that this water system was one of the features of the house which the buyers particularly liked. We have used RO systems for many years but never had a system before that had the high volume output. That really makes a huge difference not having to wait for so long while a glass or pitcher (or our 2.5 gallon dog waterer) gets filled.
customer_reviews.author: WindyW

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water. Terrific flow rate. I've had it for almost two years and it has been great. No problems. Amazing customer service / tech help. The company employees seem very invested in the company and said it is American based & made.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha VonStone

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install - Excellent Water
customer_reviews.text: We were tired of paying for bottled water, but wanted an excellent tasting water. This is it! The installation was easy. Dealing with customer service was fantastic when we had an issue we didn't understand. We purchased a water quality meter to test it and the difference was amazing. The ppm went from 274 down to 19. Everyone is drinking more water and the cost savings from paying for delivery water will pay for this many, many, many times over. We did a lot of research prior to making this purchase and I think we made the best decision.
customer_reviews.author: Elbertai Company LLC

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous system and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this compact reverse osmosis home water purifying system! I can't speak to installation because I had it done professionally during a kitchen remodel....but I can say with confidence that the water it produces and the company are wonderful. The water has a really wonderful taste. I should include that I added a fourth cartridge to mine from another source that puts minerals back into the water after it's purified. The company has been very helpful and nice to work with too. I had a problem with one replacement cartridge leaking and when I called they immediately sent me a new one, no hassle, no returning the defective one to them. I strongly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great System Great Water
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fact that you can buy a system that not only cleans the water of the Chlorine and other local water system chemicals but also from many pharmaceuticals. With my wife having bouts with cancer the things we put in our body have become very important to us.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions need work
customer_reviews.text: System is great! The installation instructions are brutal. The online videos are more helpful but not 100% thorough. For example they don't mention to put teflon tape on the tank threads before attaching the valve. The tank leaked and I had to reinstall with tape. No a huge deal but just shows the lack of attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: ... home master osmosis system but it didn't resolve the bad tasting water and my wife was not convinced it ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed an undersink water filter/purifier prior to purchasing the home master osmosis system but it didn't resolve the bad tasting water and my wife was not convinced it was really filtering. After I installed the Home Master system, the water tasted perfect (even I could tell a difference). The installation was straightforward and the manufacturer's support is unparalleled. This is a great vendor and a great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Braly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this R/O system
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this R/O system. Was very hesitant about getting one, not sure if the water quality and taste were as good as advertised. I was so surprised, can't believe the difference in our water now. I have not bought a single water bottle since installing this. We did have a pressure valve that was faulty, but called Home Master and they sent out a new, tested valve right away. Very easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nall

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive! Super easy to install. I replaced another unit that died and it took no time at all. It appears like an octopus when it arrrives, but it all makes sense in a few minutes while installing. The water in my area has fluoride and lots of chlorine. This unit removes any trace smell or taste. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Tapmaster artesian
customer_reviews.text: This my second home master artesion reverse osmosis system, just purchased for my new home. It was delivered quickly, The instalation was quick and easy. The system works so well beyond my expectations. I use the water for Everthing from ice to water for my pets, cooking, watering plants. I also appreciate the fast flow of the water and the system refills quickly. I highly recommend this product, well worth the money. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: jody johnson

customer_reviews.title: I got her this for Mother's Day and we love it. I haven't had to replace a filter ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a water filtration system for a long time. I got her this for Mother's Day and we love it. I haven't had to replace a filter yet, and we have a family of 6. We do not use our tap water, just this. Was very simple to install, and the pressure is great. I would recommend this to anyone. Saves a fortune on bottled water too. Get a Nalgene, fill it, throw it in the fridge, and you've got cold "bottled" water every day.
customer_reviews.author: Snips

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great and quick filling
customer_reviews.text: I love this filter. Water tastes great , even if it's sat In a bottle all day. The water pressure is also a perk. Quicky fill up a glass or carafe.
customer_reviews.author: RallyRaccoon

customer_reviews.title: A good RO System
customer_reviews.text: It is a good system, easy to install and produces excellent water. The instructions were straight forward and it went in without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable RO System
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for over two years installed already, the water still tastes great and no leaks. Installation instructions are clear and hardware is very good quality. I've changed the ISetTMA8 (pre-filter, carbon and post mineral) set once a 4 months ago, very easy to do. Overall very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GZMN

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this system
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing and researching several other water purification systems, we chose this one and were so we did. the system so easy to install and works perfectly. We had a water main in the town break about 3 months after our install and it forced a lot of sediment into the system. I had to call customer service to get some help and clear the system and they couldn't be more helpful. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: tomas dordevic

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water and super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Knowing what people put down the drain makes city water pretty scary, plus it smells like bleach, a toxin. I wanted a safe and healthy alternative. Bottled water is a pain, plus it doesn't taste that good to me, then there's the problem of toxic plastic. The Tap Master R/O was the perfect solution. It comes out of it's own faucet on the sink, making it so convenient, and I feel confident it is safe. I use it for everything, coffee, cooking, hummingbird feeders, cat water, and washing my hands. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: pianobiz

customer_reviews.title: ... Osmosis Water Filter System for over 2 years and enjoy the taste of the water
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Home Master TMAFC Artesian Full Contact Under sink Reverse Osmosis Water Filter System for over 2 years and enjoy the taste of the water. I enjoyed so much that I ran a line over to my ice maker to improve the taste their also. I am moving soon and will install the same system at new house. Can not wait to do so, because the taste out of the regular tap is not cutting it. Would recommend system to anyone looking to improve the taste of their water. I am on public water as a note.
customer_reviews.author: Martha M

customer_reviews.title: Feeling confident about drinking clean water
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my water purifier ! It's so nice to feel confident about what we put into our bodies and water is one of the most important. I fill my pots of water so easily with a good flow, no trickle here. My husband was intimidated by the installation so I called our plumber who knocked it out in about an hour and a half well worth the extra $. I want to get one for my sister she has kidney problems. I love the remineralization too it's great. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Helen  Ardmore Pa

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: No dislike. Had someone install it for me. Water taste great. Also kids love the water taste.
customer_reviews.author: The

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an old RO system and checked out improved systems and chose this one. The installation was very easy. It took about as long to remove my old one as it did to install this one. I was also curious about the taste difference and I will say it tastes great. It costs a little more than others but I believe it is worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and the water tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is now the only water in my house I will drink!!! Love the product and the water tastes great! I often have people ask me about how well it works and I run water straight from the tap and have them smell the chlorine in it and then I run water into a glass from the RO filter and it has no smell. Great taste and I've hooked it up to my instant hot water and ice maker too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! The water tastes great! No more plastic bottles for me!
customer_reviews.author: Harborgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Installing this filter was very easy. Just followed the step by step video. The more important part is the final results. Water is filtered clean for drinking and cooking. The tank holds a lot of water so we don't run out or need to wait for filtering. I should add I keep on ending up with the city fixing broken pipes in the street sending sand into the water line. Having the filter really makes a big difference as the water in the kitchen is always clean so these activities don't disrupt cooking for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mijeenie

customer_reviews.title: Best R.O. system on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've had this system in my house now for over 2 years and having owned 2 other brands prior to this one, that Home Master beats the others by a huge margin. It was easy to install, and changing filters is a breeze. Water pressure is easily 2x as good as the others and the water tastes great. Customer service is also top notch. Five stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: pooldoc

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and recommend to friends and family
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install. Incredible tasting water. Would absolutely recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit- it was easy to install (I've installed one other kind of RO in my previous home). Works as promised- water tastes great. I also bought the permeate pump. I've had it for one year and no issues. Also- I'd recommend upgrading the faucet if you've got the bankroll. The faucet works fine but looks a bit "regular" if you have an updated kitchen with granite/stainless/etc.
customer_reviews.author: kuruption

customer_reviews.title: High Quality H2O
customer_reviews.text: couldn't be happier with this unit! excellent water- excellent flow- excellent deal. the faucet has been updated to all chrome and did not have the black plastic nozzle shown in the picture; its the same faucet only with a chrome tip instead of black plastic.
customer_reviews.author: kcmo.me

product_meta.title: Home Master TMAFC Artesian Full Contact Undersink Reverse Osmosis Water Filter System,White
product_meta.description: Home Master Artesian Full Contact Reverse Osmosis System solves many of the problems associated with traditional RO systems. Home Master RO systems use larger fittings and tubing than Traditional RO systems to double the flow rate. Traditional RO systems produce demineralized water that is highly pure but slightly acidic. This acidic water attacks the rubber bladder in the storage tank, entering the water stream and affecting the taste. The patented Home Master Artesian Full Contact remineralizes the water twice. Our patented remineralization system pH balances the water once on the way to the storage tank, and once again on the way to the faucet adding a small amount of calcium and magnesium minerals (30-60 mg/l), just enough to make the water slightly alkaline and improve the taste. The Home Master Artesian Full Contact delivers Mineral Water on Tap by first stripping the water clean, removing up to 98-percent of chlorine, chemicals, heavy metals, dissolved solids, pharmaceuticals and other contaminants using reverse osmosis, sediment and carbon filtration, then channels the water through the patented remineralization system twice to add calcium and magnesium minerals from a fresh new source. With 7 stages of filtration, purification and enhancement The Home Master Artesian Full Contact produces exceptionally pure, Mineral Water on Tap. In designing the Home Master RO a sophisticated combination of flow restriction components were integrated into the system architecture to regulate pressure in the 50 gpd membrane chamber for optimized purification and minimized wastewater production. The most sophisticated components certified to NSF standards are included in the design and construction of our product. In the Box: Fully assembled purification unit, storage tank, 1 year of filters, 3/8-Inch feed water adapter with shut off, chrome faucet, faucet adapter, tfc RO membrane, drain saddle and instructions. 5 year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Purity You Need with the Minerals You Want - restores natural calcium and magnesium minerals removed during the reverse osmosis process to produce clean, pure Mineral Water on Tap
Exceptional Purification - removes up to 98-percent of chemicals, heavy metals, sediment, and other contaminants then adds good minerals
Filter element and the filter housing are all-in-one modular assembly for quick and easy annual changes - No wrenches necessary
Long lasting and easy change filters - change only once a year or every 2000 gallons; no wrenches required. Home Master RO is not designed to treat microbially unsafe or non-potable water

Included Fast Flow RO Kit - Double the flow from your faucet fills your cup twice as fast as standard RO systems. Purification unit - 16 high x 8 wide x 5 deep inches. Reserve tank - 15 high x 11 diameter inches
